item.title: Atom with Terminal - Mac
item.description: Atom is the one of the most popular JavaScript front-end tools. It is simple editor for writing the JavaScript program is one of the best IDEs to find customization for doing everything without modifying the configuration file. I’ll give some steps to add teminal in Atom in this blog. Open Atom Go to Packages category under Atom in the top of you screen. Under Packages category, click install.
